decision_conditions: <div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed development for reasons of mass, bulk, size, scale, siting and design will appear </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">disproportionately</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;large and at odds with the character and appearance of the the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area which is notable as it is&nbsp;located within the Becontree Estate. The proposal presents uncharacteristic and unsympathetic development as such it is considered unacceptable and contrary to: </span><span style="font-size:11pt">Paragraphs&nbsp;130 and 134&nbsp;of the NPPF (DLUHC, 2021),&nbsp;Policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), p<span pt="" sans="">olicies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local LDF Core Strategy (2010),&nbsp;<span pt="" sans="">policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>LDF Borough Wide DPD (2011),&nbsp;<span pt="" sans="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2012),&nbsp;</span>Housing Design Quality and Standards SPG (2020) and p<span pt="" sans="">olicies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>The LBBD Draft Local Plan (2021).</span><br></div><div><p><o:p></o:p></p></div>

<div><span style="font-size:11pt">The proposed development for reasons of mass, bulk, size, scale and sitting will result in unacceptable levels of overshadowing and the material loss of daylight and sunlight to number&nbsp;391 Ivyhouse Road. Likewise, the proposed development would result in a&nbsp;harmful impact to the standard of living of the residents of&nbsp;391 Ivyhouse Road.&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposal represents overbearing and unneighbourly development</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;contrary to: NPPF (2021),&nbsp;</span><span pt="" sans="" style="font-size: 11pt;">policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">LDF Borough Wide DPD (2011), DMD6 of the LBBD Draft Local Plan (2021) and the&nbsp;Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2012), which aim to achieve well-designed developments which result in as little obtrusive impact to the local area and neighbours.&nbsp;</span></div><div><p class="MsoNormal">
